text: teen maheene ho chale the veena ko deharaadoon se aae
keval do hee baar gaee thee vah ghar maan se milane
is beech amit ne bhee use teen patr likhe the
ghar kee baaton ke siva vah use aur kuchh nahee likhata tha
maan ne khabar dee suneeta ke aane kee
do din kee chhutee mil paee use keval
suneeta se milane ko vah bhee bahut utaavalee thee
ghar pahunchate hee usase lipat gaee
raat ko dono alag baithee to baat suneeta ne chalaee
vah bolee veena se veena bhavishy ke baare mein socha hai kuchh
sochana kaisa achchha hee to chal raha hai sab
veena suneeta kee baat ka arth samajhee lekin use koee mahatv na dete hue usane kaha
yah to vakt kaatane ka tareeka hai
mera matalab to doosara hai
suneeta ne jaanaboojhakar aadhee baat kahee
tum jo kahana chaah rahee ho use samajh rahee hoon main
lekin yah nahin ho sakata veena ka utar bhee sanket maatr hee tha usake manobhaavon ka
hone ko kya nahin ho sakata suneeta ne phir kaha
lekin jo tum chaah rahee ho vah nahin ho sakata
veena ke svar mein kuchh kathorata aa rahee thee
dekho tum apana mood naarmal rakho
main tumase kuchh anuchit kahakar manavaana nahin chaah rahee
main to apane manobhaavon ko prakat kar rahee hoon
tum suno samajh kar javaab do
achchha lage to haan kahana bura lage to nakaar do
lekin man ko naarmal rakho
suneeta ne phir ek koshish kee
mera man naarmal hai
lekin tumase ek hee anurodh hai ki krapa karake jo tumhaare man mein hai use ghumaaphira kar mat kaho
veena ne svayan sanyat svar mein kaha
achchha baaba lo seedhe shabdon mein poochhatee hoon veena tum apane parivaar kee socho phir se
apana ghar basaane kee socho
suneeta ke shabd spasht the is baar
vah to hai mera mera apana main hoon meree yaaden hai isaka sadasy dev har samay hai saath mere bas
veena kshan bhar mein bhaavuk ho gaee itana achchha itana chhota parivaar aur ab to mere har or rangeen najaare hai
dherase bachche aur dherasee unakee khushiyaan
itanee bhaavuk ho gaee ki rone lagee
veena dekho na tum kaisee pagaleesee baaten karatee ho
main to tumase jeevan kee vaastavikata kee baat karana chaah rahee theeaur tum phir bhaavukata kee rau mein bahane lagee
suneeta bhee bhaavuk ho chalee thee
mera jeevan hee meree bhaavanaon se bandha hai aur tum ho ki achchhe chalate jeevan mein rok lagaana chaahatee ho
chaahatee ho ek naam jo odha hai use utaar phenk doon aur doosara odh loon
vah bigad jae phir teesara
bas yahee vaastavikata hai tumhaaree
yahee jeevan hai tumhaare shabdon mein donon bahanen thee lekin sochane ka daayara alagagal tha unaka
veena sach to yahee hai ki yahee vaastavikata hai
bina purush ke naaree aur bina naaree ke purush adhoora hai
suneeta ke shabd veena par apana asar nahin daal rahe the
yah bahut puraanee dakiyaanoosee baat hai
kuchh nahee rakha is bandhan mein
sabase bada bandhan hai man ka
man mein base saathee se bada koee saath nahin
duniyaadaaree sab dikhaava hai
sab chhalaava hai man ka
veena bhee aapanee soch ko apane manobhaavon ko spashat rup se vyakt kar rahee thee
chhlaava nahin kuchh bhee man ka veena samajho jara
dev mila tha tumhen tab bhee tumhen talaash thee ek purush kee
vah tumane dev mein dekha
vah purush nahee tha sirph tumhaare man ka chhalaava tha
chhal liya usane tumhen
kaise bandhee raheen tum us napunsak ke sang
suneeta to aaj jaise thaan kar aaee thee veena ke man mein baithee dev kee yaad ko utaarane kee
lekin veena itana na sun sakee cheekhasee padee bas karo bas suneeta tum had se badh rahee ho
rone lagee mere dev ko in bure shabdon ka haar na pahanao
suneeta ne baahon mein bhar liya use
vah bhee rone lagee
roterote hee bolee kah le mujhe jo kuchh bhee kahana chaahatee hai
aaj man kee har bhadaas nikaal de too lekin meree baat sun veena yah sachchaee hai
jeevan kee sachchaee ko samajh too dev kee yaadon ka palloo baandhe jindagee kaat nahee sakatee too dev jaise kaee aur hain
koee aur mil jaega aur dekh lena tab too hee kahegee jo hua achchha hua
mat kaho kuchh bhee mujhe
tumhen patipatnee ke rishte mein keval ek shaareerik jarurat dikhaee pad rahee hai
mujhe keval ek pyaar dikhata hai
mera dev mere jeevan se jud gaya hai
mera dev mere saath hai
main akelee nahin
vah apanee rulaee par niyantran paane kee cheshta kar rahee thee akelee main tab pad jaatee hoon jab tum log yah kahate ho ki mera dev ab nahee raha
mera dev ab mere saath nahee bhaavanaon kee rau mein bah chukee thee veena
dev kee yaadon se alag nahee hona chaahatee thee vah
tum bahut bhaavuk ho veena vah bhaavukata itanee adhik badh gaee hai ki mujhe yah tumhaara paagalapan lagata hai
suneeta ne phir kaha jo bhaavanaon se baahar nikaalane kee koshish karatee ja rahee thee
chalo main paagal sahee
par achchhee hoon
mujhe mere haal par chhod do
mera vakt achchhee tarah kat rah hai
mera vakt kat jaega
mere skool mein dekho kitanee nans hain sabhee avivaahita
kya ve nahee jeetee apana jeevan khushee se aur tab jaise kuchh yaad aaya use bolee main to soch rahee hoon kitane dino se main bhee nan hee ban jaun un jaise
sistar rojaleen to mujhe saharsh apane saath rakh legee
suneeta usakee baat sunakar dar gaee jaise
dar se grast hue bolee naana veena aisa mat karana
tum jaisee ho vaisee hee theek ho
bas isake aage kuchh mat sochana
main tumase ab nahin kahoongee kabhee lekin nan banakar jeene kee baat mat karana tum
dar gaee kal kya hoga yah to samay hee bataega lekin ab yadi kisee ne dubaara baat kee to yah pakka hai ki main hostal se kabhee lautakar nahee aagee
veena ka nirnay sunakar suneeta bhee dar gaee
usane veena ko gale lagaaya aur usakee peeth sahalaate hue bolee chal chup ho ja veena ab kabhee aisee baat nahee karungee
ab kabhee nahee kahoongee tujhe
tu chup ho ja
pagalee hai too tujhe badal paana mere bas mein nahee
udhar kamare ke daravaaje ke peechhe khadee nirmala kee aankhen bahane lageen aviral
sisakana chaah rahee thee lekin rok liya usane svayan ko
uthakar pannaalaal ke paas chalee aaee
unaka kamara door tha veena ke kamare se
vahaan pahunch kar phoot padee vah
pannaalaal ne aisa dekha to poochha kya hua nirmala
pagala gaee hai veena kya hoga isaka
sab theek hoga meree bachchee samajhadaar hai
samay se sab theek ho jaega
tum log use kisee bahas mein na ulajhao
pannaalaal jaise sab jaanata tha ki maan nirmala va suneeta man mein kya chaah rahee hai
vah na unakee haan mein tha na hee unakee na mein
vah veena kee ichchha ke saath tha
agalee baar amit jab priya se milane deharaadoon aaya to nirmala usake saamane apane man ka dukhada le baithee
amit samajhata tha usake duhkh ko
sochata tha lekin use koee raasta sujhaee na deta
dev ko gujare saat maheene ho chale the
sabhee kee dinacharya niyamit ho chalee thee
dillee mein maan krashna hee theen jo har aane vaale ke saamane baithakar dev ko yaad karake rotee theen aur yahaan usane dekha maan nirmala kee bhee yahee dasha thee
usaka duhkh tha veena ka bhavishy
vah veena ke bhavishy kee soch har dam rotee rahatee theen
aaj bhee vah apana duhkh apane aap se hee baant rahee hain
kya hai usake man mein mujhe nahin maaloom
bas jabase hostal gaee hai subah se shaam tak masheen ke bhaanti bachchon mein ramee rahatee hai
apanee to use na dev ke rahate hosh thee aur na ab hee kuchh khabar hai
usaka jeevan doosaron ke lie hee bana hai
nirmala ka svar aansooon se bheega tha
amit ne sune usake shabd
man veena ke lie kuchh karane ko laalaayit tha
lekin karata kya yahee bola kya karun mammee mujhe to kuchh samajh nahee aata
man mein dherasee baaten aatee hai unake lie lekin kuchh upaay hai nahee mere paas
amit dheerese yahee kah saka
usaka svayan ka man to donon or se duvidha mein ghira tha
veena ka duhkh ek or aur doosaree or apanee va priya ke ek ho jaane kee chinta
kisee anjaan bhay se har samay usaka man vichalit rahata tha
beta aisa vaataavaran to hai nahee hamaare samaaj ka ki betee akelee saaree jindagee kaat legee
kabhee na kabhee kisee na kisee sahaare kee jarurat padatee hai
aise mein saaladosaal to kat jaenge
lekin poore jindagee padee hai abhee usakee

kaise kaategee vah har din koee to sahaara hona chaahie nirmala ko amit se apane man kee baat kahate hue bahut chain mil raha tha bolatee ja rahee thee abhee dekho usakee soorat dekhakar lagata hai jaise koee rog lag gaya ho use
bilkul nichudasee gaee hai
yah to dikhaava hai apane man ko jhooth ka sahaara die hai veena ki mujhe ab skool ke bachchon mein hee apana jeevan dikhaee padata hai
man mein to ghutaghut kar hee jee rahee hai meree bachchee
vah to main bhee samajhata hoon mammee ki bhaabhee aaj nahin to kal bilkul akelee pad jaegee

ham jin paarivaarik va saamaajik paristhatiyon mein palebadhe hain vahaan svatann hokar akele jeene vaalee ladakiyaan gineechunee hee hotee hain aur jo hotee hain vah dherasee kunthaon kee shikaar ho jaatee hain
amit kee baat sun kar nirmala ko laga ki vah jo kuchh bhee kah raha hai usakee soch ke hee anurup hai vah
beta tum kuchh karo usake lie
nirmala ne kaha amit se
man yahee kahata tha usaka ki veena jaise amit kee har baat maan jaegee
mujhase kahie kya karana hai main to bhaabhee ke sukh ke lie sab karane ko taiyaar hoon
amit ne kaha
man phir kisee agyaat aashanka se dhadaka usaka lekin aisee nahee thee koee baat
tab nirmala ne kaha koee ladaka dhoondhon usake lie
mainne bhee socha lekin mere aasapaas koee aisa nahin jisase baat kar sakoon aur phir pahale bhaabhee ke man ko bhee to tatolana hoga
haan main jaanatee thee tum yahee kahoge
usake man ko tatola tha ek baar suneeta ne
phir is baar mainne
bahut gussa kiya tha usane
lekin ab mainne jab usase kaha to chup rahee
yah chuppee usakee haan hai yah to main nahin jaanatee par baat ko main aage bhee badhaane kee himmat nahee kar paee
ho sakata hai jo gussa unhone suneeta deedee se kiya vah aapake upar prakat na kar sakee ho
amit ne apanee baat kahee
tab nirmala ko laga jaise amit ko har baat maaloom hai
poochha tumhen maaloom hai is baat ka
haan priya ne likha tha
ham to kab se isee baat par vichaar kar rahe hain ki bhaabhee ko hamen hee samajhaana chaahie lekin darate hai unake gusse se
amit ne bataee nirmala ko apanepriya ke beech kee baat
tab nirmala ne kaha kitana badal gaee veena pahale to gussa tha hee nahee usake man mein
ab to baatabaat par bhadak uthatee hai ya rone lagatee hai
dar lagata hai kuchh adhik kah diya to kaheen ghar aana hee band na kar de
isee ko dhyaan mein rakhakar mai ishaare se kuchh kahane kee himmat kar paee aur use chup dekhakar meree jubaan ko to taala lag gaya tha
nirmala kee baat sunakar amit ne kaha main samajhata hoon bhaabhee prem se khulakar baat kar sakatee hai
vah chhuttee aaega to main usee se kahoonga bhaabhee ko pyaar se samajhaane ko
amit kee baat beech mein hee kaat kar bolee nirmala kahaan beta
prem aur usake daidee ek hee mittee ke bane hai
donon hee kahate hai veena kee khushee jisamen hogee vaisa hee karenge
vah shaadee karana chaahegee tab bhee ham usake saath hai
vah shaadee nahee karana chaahegee tab bhee usake saath hai
lekin kabhee us par jabaradastee apane vichaar nahin laadenge
amit ke lie yah baat naee thee
yah sunakar vah bola tab himmat karake main hee baat karunga bhaabhee se
aap yadi ijaajat den to kal subah main aur priya unhen masooree mein mil len
jarur jao beta
kuchh ho jae achchha veena ka isase badhakar aur kya khushee hogee mere lie
maan nirmala ne apanee sveekrati de dee
priya kaalej se laut aaee
amit ko dekhakar vah phoolee na samaee
hraday kee dhadakan badh jaatee thee usakee amit ko dekhate hee
kaise ho itana hee poochh paee maan ke saamane vah usase
tab nirmala uthakar khaana banaane rasoee mein chalee gaee
amit ne uthakar usake gaalon par chutakee kaatee aur kaha kal subah ham bhaabhee se milane masooree ja rahe hai
ham kaun priya ne anjaan banate hue poochha
mai aur tum amit ne muskuraate hue kaha
mammee se poochha poochha priya ne
unhonne hee kaha hai
aur tab amit ne use dheere se saaree baat bataee
aur sab sunakar priya ne chutakee lee sab baat to samajha gaee lekin aakhir mein apane lie mera saath paane ka bahaana badee chaalaakee se tumane taiyaar kar liya poochha priya ne
paagal ho main seeriyas hoon

main kab kah rahee hoon tum majaak kar rahe ho priya ko achchha lag raha tha ki amit mammee ke kahe anusaar veena ko samajhaana chaah raha hai aur usase bhee achchha lag raha tha ki kal vah amit ke saath akele masooree jaegee
deedee ke saath doteen ghante aur shesh din un donon ke lie tha
use amit ka saath bahut achchha lagata tha
masooree maal rod se hat kar hai kaanvent aaph jeejas end meree
log ise vevaralee kaanvent kahate hain
kaaran is chhoteesee pahaadee ko vevaraleehil ke naam se jaana jaata hai
maalarod se ek dam seedhee chadhaee hai
amit ko skool tak kaar le jaane mein ghabaraahat mahasoos ho rahee thee
tab donon ne nishchay kiya ki skool tak paidal hee chala jae
kaar maalarod ke kinaare banee paarkig mein khadee karake vah skool kee or chal diye
maal se skool kee dooree sirph aadha kilomeetar thee par ekadam seedhee chadhaee
ekadoosare ka haath pakade pahale to ve tejee se chale
lekin tej chalane se unakee saans jaldee hee phool gaee
ekadoosare ka haath chhod vah apanee saans ko niyannit karane mein lag gae
kuchh der unhen rukana pada
saathasaath khade dono ko aapanee aur ekadoosare kee saanson kee aavaaj sunaee de rahee thee
ghaatee mein dooradoor tak hariyaalee phailee thee
usase aage nabh chhootee gagan choomatee pahaadiyaan
saans sambhalee to haath phir mil gae
saathasaath donon aage badhane lage
dheeredheere chalo kadamasekadam milaakar
saans kaaboo mein rahegee
kaha amit ne priya se
skool pahunche us samay do baj rahe the dopahar ke
veena daaramaitaree mein thee
chaparaasee ne jab khabar dee to bhaagee chalee aaee
donon ko dekhakar ekaek khilasee uthee
vat e plaijent sarapraeej veena khushee se priya se lipat gaee
phir bade prem se amit se milee
donon haath thaamen usake bolee tum kab aae
kal hee amit ne muskura kar utar diya
chalo baahar restaraan mein chalate hai chhotaasa hai magar kaam chal jaata hai
veena unhen lie baahar kee or badh gaee
skool ke get ke baahar hee ek chhotaasa restaraan tha
khaanepeene kee sab cheejen
shaayad bachcho kee jaruraton ko dhyaan mein rakhakar banaaya gaya tha
abhibhaavak jab bhee aate honge bachchon ke to yaheen baithakar apana man bahala lete honge
chaay peete hue idharudhar kee baaten hotee raheen
amit shabd juta raha tha
shabdon ke saathasaath himmat bhee juta raha tha
kaise kahe vah veena se
aakhir himmat jutaee usane aur kaha yahaan kaisa lagata hai bhaabhee
achchha lagata hai
samay kat jaata hai
kab subah se shaam hotee hai pata hee nahee chalata
raat jaldee sona nahee ho paata to der raat tak koeenakoee kitaab padh letee hoon
veena ne sahaj bhaav se utar diya
lekin apanee baat kahane ke baad use ekaek laga jaise amit ke chhotese prashn ke utar mein jo shabd kahe hai ve sab sach to nahin na to vah koee kitaab padhatee thee na ab padhatee hai
amit ko is baat ka pata tha

vah jarur padhata tha tabhee ek din jab der raat gae tak veena ko neend nahee aa rahee thee to usane use ek upanyaas diya tha aur kaha tha ise padh lo bhaabhee raat kat jaegee aur padhatepadhate neend bhee aa jaegee
us par veena ne kaha tha na baaba na mai upanyaas dekhakar hee bor ho jaatee hoon
usase behatar hai khulee chhat par baithakar taare ginana
tab taare ginatee thee
aur ab kitaab padhatee hai
amit ne poochh liya yah aadat kab se padee
aap to bor ho jaatee theen kitaabon se
lekin veena ne svatah hee apane shabd badal diye vah to main yoon hee kah gaee
main ab bhee taare ginatee rahatee hoon
yahaan aap taare ginatee ho vahaan mammee raat ke andhere mein koee chiraag dhoondhatee rahatee hai
daidee man hee man kuchh sochate rahate hai
sab aur khaamoshee chhaee huee hai
aapane to sabase alag aakar svayan ko samajha liya hai lekin sab bade aapake ya ham chhote aapase aage kuchh nahin soch pa rahe
amit ke shabdon ne veena ko bhee gambheer bana diya
mai to chaahatee hoon sab khush rahen
sab apane ko doosare kaamon mein vyast rakhen
vakt yoon hee kat jaega
veena kee soch udaas ho gaee thee
jeevan vakt kaatane ke lie to nahin mila
jeevan to jeene ke lie mila hai
hamen aage nae raaste kee khoj mein lage rahane ko mila hai
aise mein aapako yoon virakt dekhakar ham aapake vishay mein sochane ke siva kya kar sakate hai
amit napetule shabdon ka prayog kar raha tha
veena ab chup thee
amit ne phir kaha bhaabhee main kuchh kahana chaahata hoon aapase
aap vaayada karo gussa nahin karogee
mere baat ka bura nahin maanogee
veena samajh gaee ki amit aage kya kahana chaahata hai
itana hee bolee tumhaaree baat sada sunee hai amit tum jo kahana chaahate ho kaho main sun rahee hoon
tab amit ne himmat jutaee
seedhe shabdon ka prayog karate hue bola bhaabhee kuchh baate hotee hai jo hamen sirph apane lie nahee karanee hotee
dusaron ke man ko dekhakar nirnay lena hota hai
aap aaj jis manahsthiti ke daur se gujar rahee hai vah ham sab samajhate hai
aapake jeevan mein pichhale dinon jo utaarachadhaav aae ve ham sabane dekhe hai
samajhate hai aapake manobhaavon ko
aap jo kuchh bhee chaah rahee thee vaisa hee sabane saath diya
aap jaisa koee virala hoga jo apana daayitv itanee bakhoobee se nibha sakega
ab aap jis tarah sabase kat kar yahaan skool mein svayan ko vyast kie ho yah baat kisee ko raas nahin aa rahee
meree ya kisee aur kee baat hotee to shaayad aapako sochane ko koee vivash nahee karata
aaj baat hai ek poore parivaar kee aur usase upar maan kee
maan ke saathasaath daidee kee
ve dono apane hee tareeke se har dam aapakee sochate rahate hai
daidee ko to aap jaanatee hai ve apane man kee baat kisee ko nahee kahate
lekin mammee to sada aapakee sochatee rahatee hai aur din bhar rotee hai
sir dard se phatata hai lekin chain nahin paateen
amit kee bhoomika bahut lambee ho chalee thee
lekin seedhe mudde kee baat karane mein use samay lag raha tha
ekaek amit ne shabdon kee raah badalee aur kahane laga bhaabhee
ek saath prashnon kee jhadee laga dee thee veena ne
amit ne kuchh socha phir kahane laga koee kamee nahee jis raaste par aap chal rahee hai usamen
lekin kya yah sach nahee kee yah raasta aapakee apanee ichchhaon ko daba raha hai

meree bhaabhee ne kabhee kya socha tha akele jeevan basar karane ka kya kabhee bhee yah kalpana kee thee ki aap akelee in nans kee tarah jeevan bitaengee aapane to sada ek parivaar kee kalpana kee thee

aur phir sada aapakee kya ichchha rahee aap aapaka parivaar aapake bhaeebahan aapake maataapita sabhee prasann rahe aur aise mein ek baar yadi chot lag gaee hai to yahee chot baarabaar lagane kee aashanka se pair peechhe hata lie jaen kya yahee behatar hai
baat badal kar veena ne kaha amit se tum apane bhaee ko bhool sakate ho
nahin bilkul nahin bhool sakata
amit jaise taiyaar tha
tab main use kaise bhool jaun
dekhie bhaabhee na to main bhool sakata hoon na aap
koee bhee apane beete din nahee bhool sakata aur na hee bhool paata hai
lekin yahee jeevan hai
jeevan mein roj kuchh naya hota hai aur aise mein jeevan ko roka nahee ja sakata haan dev ke saath dasabees varsh bitae hote aapane
koee yaaden chhod gaya hota aapaka parivaar hota bachche hote unhee ke sang jeevan beet jaata
yahaan to haathon kee menhandee bhee nahee utaree aur aapake sapane toot gae
aise mein kya ek aur koshish galat hai apana sirph apana parivaar banaane kee
tab veena bahut der tak chup rahee
sochatee rahee
vaastav mein akelaapan tha veena ka jo usako kaat raha tha
nae sire se jindagee jeena chaah rahee thee vah
vah naya sira vah naee raah usane dhoondhee thee is skool kee chaaradivaaree mein
aur usake sabhee shubhachintak use doosare raaste ko chunane ko kah rahe the

nae sire se is jindagee mein chuppee to rahegee aur doosare raaste par khushee laut sakatee hai aise mein sochane lagee ki kya uchit hai usake lie ek avasar phir se bhaagy ko de vah aise mein apane boodhe hote maanbaap ka chintaakul chehara usake maanasapatal par chha gaya
sochane lagee thee veena ki aasapaas ka har saathee ek hee baat se chintit hai
ek hee baat veena akelee hai vah akelee kaisee jiegee yahaan skool mein bhee to yahee ho raha tha koee bhee milata tha yahee poochhata ki vah shaadeeshuda hai
haan kahatee to saaree kahaanee sunaanee padatee
daya hee vaapasee mein milatee
shabdon kee daya ka paan banakar rah gaee thee vah
aur yadi chup rahatee to aane vaala koee na koee rishta bata jaata
yah baat to vah amit ko nahin bata paee thee
sach yah bhee tha ki kaanvent ke hostal mein bachchon ke beech kaheen apanee bachchee ko daudate dekhane kee kalpana mein vah ghanto shaam ko skool ke graund mein baithee rahatee
kabheekabhee hans detee thee apanee kalpana mein
kabhee aksar rone se hee usaka man halka ho paata tha
kahane ko bin shaadee bin bachche bahut jeetee hai
skool mein bhee kitanee nans thee aisee
lekin vah na to aise parivesh mein paleebadee thee aur na hee usaka kabhee aisa sapana tha
ek bhalee aurat apane lie sundar parivaar sundar pati sundar bachcho kee kalpana karatee hai jo kaalej se usane bhee kee thee
aur usaka sapana saakaar bhee hua tha lekin aisa ki jo aankh khulate hee toot gaya
vah akelee rah gaee
sirph sasuraal hai isake sahaare to ek vidhava ka jeevan nahin jee sakatee
haan bachche hote to unake lie jee letee
vah to kuchh nahee dekar gaya
na bachche aur na hee koee aisee yaaden jinake sahaare vah jee letee
bahut antarmukhee apane gam ko pee kar rahane vaalee
lekin ek bheetar kaheen dabee chaah thee jo sab use upar laakar bitha gae
subah se shaam raat dhalane par bhee jo koee aata ek hee vaaky kahata veena bina shaadee kie kaise rahogee saaree jindagee to padee hai kaise kaatogee
aur veena koee asaadhaaran jeevaatma to na thee jo sirph saadhvee ka chola pahan kar jee letee dev ke itane meethe sapane bhee na the usake paas
nae sapane naee duniya nae chehare kee talaash usake antarman se upar ubhar kar aa gaee aur usane chuppee ko tod kar amitapriya se kah diya ek hee shabd jo maan kahen vahee karo
main ab kabhee apanee baat nahin kahoongee
ek pal to amit ko laga tha ki usane svayan ko nirjeev karaar diya hai aisa kahakar
doosaron ko itana chintit dekhakar kaheen veena ne yahee to nahee soch liya ki usake shaadee karane se kamasekam yah rojaroj ka laphada khatm ho jaega
jeevan kee dhuree aage kee or badhana to shuru kar degee
vyarth mein sab ruk gaya hai
vah kamasekam jee to paegee apanee tarah se
ek samajhota maan kar byaah kar le phir se
jo ab hua hai dev ke jaane par usase bada duhkh to aur koee nahin hoga
achchha hee hoga shaayad ya phir duhkh bhee hua to sah legee use
badesebada duhkh sahane kee kshamata to de hee gaya hai dev use
